questions.text: Which of the following is NOT a characteristic of a cyber crisis?
Which type of exercise is most suitable for organizations that have never conducted cyber crisis management exercises?
What does the Asset Management (AM) domain aim to achieve within the CRR framework?
options: To provide training for cybersecurity awareness
To monitor external dependencies and their impact on service delivery
To document and manage assets throughout their lifecycle to support critical services
To ensure the availability and integrity of critical service assets
questions.correctAnswer: To document and manage assets throughout their lifecycle to support critical services

questions.text: Which potential impact should be considered during cyber crisis management exercises to ensure comprehensive preparedness?
options: Reputational damage, application unavailability, and legal repercussions
Expansion of the organization's market presence
questions.correctAnswer: Reputational damage, application unavailability, and legal repercussions

questions.text: According to the NIST Framework Version 1.1, which of the following is NOT a component of the framework?
What is the primary objective of organizing cyber crisis management exercises within an organization?
options: To identify and punish employees responsible for security breaches
To reduce the number of cyber attacks
To develop reflexes and enhance teamwork during a crisis
questions.correctAnswer: To develop reflexes and enhance teamwork during a crisis

questions.text: What is a critical step that technical teams must undertake during a cyber crisis?
Which domain within the Cyber Resilience Review (CRR) focuses on managing the lifecycle and integrity of assets?
What is a key feature of the CRR self-assessment process?
options: It only assesses the physical security measures in place
It is an interview-based assessment led by external cybersecurity experts
It requires the participation of external facilitators only
It focuses solely on financial risks
It enables organizations to conduct the assessment independently without external facilitators
questions.correctAnswer: It enables organizations to conduct the assessment independently without external facilitators

questions.text: Which of the following best describes a "critical service" as defined in the Cyber Resilience Review (CRR)?
options: A set of activities vital to the organization's success, where disruption would severely impact operations
Any service that requires a high budget to operate
A service provided to customers for free
A non-essential service with minimal impact on the organization's mission
A service that is outsourced to third-party vendors
questions.correctAnswer: A set of activities vital to the organization's success, where disruption would severely impact operations
